SOLARIA.txt.title: SOLARIA – Solar-to-X Energy Conversion Platform
SOLARIA.txt.summary: SOLARIA develops a next-gen solar-to-X platform converting solar energy into electricity, heat, and hydrogen. Targets TRL 6 in 30 months. Partners in Spain and Italy.

FASTSMART.txt.title: FASTSMART – Hybrid Rally Car with Energy Harvesting
FASTSMART.txt.summary: FASTSMART designed the first rally car with embedded energy harvesting systems (since 2017), focused on motorsport innovation and TRL demonstration under Horizon 2020.

ANGELINA.txt.title: ANGELINA – AI-Based Respiratory Diagnostic Device
ANGELINA.txt.summary: ANGELINA is an AI-powered diagnostic tool for respiratory conditions, based on digital auscultation, real-time processing, and digital twin modeling.

M2DESCO.txt.title: M2DESCO – Nanostructured Coatings for Cutting Tools and Tribological Components
M2DESCO.txt.summary: M2DESCO focuses on innovative nanocoatings for high-performance cutting tools and tribological parts in automotive and aerospace applications.

BIONANOCOMP.txt.title: BIONANOCOMP – Biodegradable and Self-Healing Nanocomposites
BIONANOCOMP.txt.summary: Development of sustainable bio-nanocomposites for automotive/aerospace: self-healing surfaces, biodegradable matrices, and digital twin integration for simulation.

BLUSPARK.txt.title: BLUSPARK – Urban Smart Sensor Networks for Air Quality and Public Safety
BLUSPARK.txt.summary: BLUSPARK deploys AI-enhanced smart sensors in urban environments to monitor air quality, noise, movement patterns and support emergency services and city management.

BiSMART.txt.title: BiSMART – Biodegradable Smart Materials for Automotive and Circular Manufacturing
BiSMART.txt.summary: BiSMART explores smart biodegradable materials for structural and aesthetic automotive parts, with high-performance targets and circular design principles.

CL4-call-2025.txt.title: HORIZON-CL4 – Digital Industry and Space 2025
CL4-call-2025.txt.summary: EN  Horizon Europe Work Programme 2025 7. Digital, Industry and Space (European Commission Decision C(2025) 2779 of 14 May 2025)...

CL5-call-2025.txt.title: HORIZON-CL5 – Climate, Energy and Mobility 2025
CL5-call-2025.txt.summary: EN  Horizon Europe Work Programme 2025 8. Climate, Energy and Mobility (European Commission Decision C(2025) 2779 of 14 May 2025)...
